title: Applying an Instructional Design Decision-Making Framework for Situated Learning Environment Design

context.prior_knowledge: Secondary science subject content and foundational general pedagogy knowledge
context.additional_context: Emphasizes enabling pre-service teachers to design situational learning activities reflecting real classroom environments.

learning_goals: Preservice teachers can design situational learning environments applicable to actual classroom contexts
Preservice teachers can make effective instructional design decisions in resource-constrained environments
Preservice teachers can develop situational learning scenarios that facilitate scientific problem-solving

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
